name: Lovience
description:
The world of lovience is a world without violence. You have a long way to go to return the feeling of lovience to everyone around you. But you can do it only by repairing the lovience lamp. The lamp that can return sweet feeling of lovience to every creature. Feel the lovience. Share the lovience. Enjoy the lovience .
No violence, just lovience .

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION

- topic (No Violence):
A game without violence, probably logic puzzles immediately come to mind. We decided to be more creative and original, so instead of hurting the enemy, we share lovience with them. But there are a lot of creatures, and you don’t have enough lovience for everyone, so you try your best to keep at least a drop of this bewitching feeling of lovience in order to fix the lovience lamp and share love with everyone. No violence, just lovience.
